alert.note: Alert for Motherlode; Northern San Joaquin Valley; West Slope Northern Sierra Nevada (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 19 at 9:27PM PDT by NWS Sacramento
info.description: ...A cluster of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Tuolumne, southwestern Alpine, southeastern El Dorado, Calaveras and central Amador Counties through 1015 PM PDT... At 927 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms over Calaveras Big Trees SP, moving northwest at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Sonora, Jackson, San Andreas, Calaveras Big Trees SP, Paloma, Bear Valley, Rail Road Flat, Pinecrest, Cooks Station, Lily Gap, Tamarack, Long Barn, Carson Hill, Tuttletown, Vallecito, Glencoe, Black Springs, Clinton, Shriner Lake Campground and Volcano. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Motherlode; Northern San Joaquin Valley; West Slope Northern Sierra Nevada
